cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure on July 28, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1339, Advanced Air Mobility Coordination and Leadership Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 36 (Thursday, February 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DAVIDS of Kansas:
H.R. 1339.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 1--All legislative Powers herein granted
shall be vested in a Congress of the United States, which
shall consist of a Senate and House of Representatives.
[Page H731]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Advanced Air Mobility Coordination and Leadership Act
